item.title: RSA-CRT
item.author: Author
item.description: RSA with CRT $$ M = C^d \ (\bmod \ n) $$ 對 $C$ 解密的過程，可以透過 CRT 加速 假設兩個未知數 $m_1 , m_2$ 如下 $m_1 = M \ (\bmod \ p) \hspace{1em} = \lbrack C^d \ (\bmod \ n) \rbrack \ (\bmod \ p) = C^d \ (\bmod \ p)$ $m_2 = M \ (\bmod \ q) \hspace{1em} = \lbrack C^d \ (\bmod \ n) \rbrack \ (\bmod \ q) = C^d \ (\bmod \ q)$

item.title: RSA
item.author: Author
item.description: RSA Parameters $$ n = p \times q $$ $$ \phi(n) = (p-1) \times (q-1) $$ $$ \gcd (e ,\ \phi (n)) = 1 $$ $$ e \times d \equiv 1 \ (\bmod \ \phi (n)) $$ Note 選擇的 $e$ 必須與 $\phi (n)$ 互質 Encryption $$ M^{e} \equiv C \ (\bmod \ n) $$ Decryption $$ C^{d} \equiv M \ (\bmod \ n) $$ Correctness $$ e \times d \equiv 1 \ (\bmod \ \phi(n)) $$
